quote_first: Nevertheless, I love her. I loved her from the first moment I beheld her; and that was at an evening-party in Mayfair, at precisely
quote_last: on Thursday evening, the twenty-fourth of December, eighteen hundred and sixty-two.
title: Miss Carew
author: Amelia B. Edwards

quote_first: Thanks to ten minutes or so of balmy weather, by
quote_last: the Earth is covered in the great carboniferous forests whose residues give us all our coal, and the first winged insects are evident.
title: A Short History of Nearly Everything
author: Bill Bryson
